name: Triple Sweet Puzzle
description:
Match 3 delicious little bears and score to win!

- Objectives differ in 200 varying levels i.e. each level is unique.

- Tempting and Tantalizing candy design
- Optimized for latest Iphone Versions

- Travel around brand new worlds: Chocolate Field,
Sunny Gardens, Hazel River, Ice Maze, Moonlit Oasis

- Classic and addictive connect 3 puzzle game

- Swap, switch, slide and connect 3 or more same candies

- Connect 4 or more candies to create special delicious candies

- Use powerful props and special candies smartly to bash Cake, Honey, Gummy Skull, Chocolate, Ice etc. Hike your score while bursting these items.

- Play anywhere anytime:

Roam about Triple Sweet Puzzle fantastic wonderland now! Perfect game for candy & bonbon lovers.

Enjoy this candy blasting game.
